start.text: You awaken in a small clearing surrounded by towering trees. A faint trail leads east toward smoke.

find_supplies.text: You find a small knife lying in the grass. It feels balanced and reliable.

camp.text: You reach an abandoned campsite. The fire is still warm.

firetrap.text: You lean too close â€” the embers flare up and burn your hand! Your health drops.

tent.text: Inside the tent, you find a first-aid kit. You use it to patch up your burns.

healed.text: You apply the medkit carefully. The pain fades and your focus sharpens.

clearing.text: You return to the clearing where your adventure began. The forest feels quieter now.

ending_good.text: You survived the forest, tested your instincts, and found your way home. Well done!
